multipart.q:
*The Little Red Ball*

Sam had a little red ball. He liked to roll it. He rolled it up the hill. The ball went whoosh! Sam ran after it. He found the ball at the bottom of the hill. Sam smiled. He rolled the ball again.

questions.context: Do _you_ remember what color the ball was?

prompt.prompt: What did Sam do with the ball?

questions.context: Do _you_ remember what Sam did with the ball?
Do _you_ remember where the ball went?
